video_prompt: Character turns head, hair sways in wind. Subtle reflections shimmer on wet ground, mirroring a dynamic sky with streaking celestial objects. Distant lights twinkle.
image_prompt: Anime style, young woman from behind, standing on a reflective wet path at dusk/dawn, long dark hair, light hooded sweatshirt, dark pleated skirt, bare legs, dark socks, light lace-up boots, holding dark backpack. Vibrant sky with soft clouds and shooting stars reflecting in water. Lake/river to the right reflecting sky, distant silhouetted mountains with subtle lights. Green and golden grass in foreground. Warm, ethereal lighting, serene mood.
refined_video_prompt: The character's head subtly pivots, their hair softly swaying in the breeze. On the wet ground, reflections continuously shimmer and shift, dynamically mirroring a sky where celestial objects streak across. Distant lights rhythmically pulse and twinkle.
